description.en: This cloak depicts lovely roses and a delicate butterfly; it was named by Matanda on Demian! It gives the wearer a 15% Speed and a 100 HP boost.
description.ar: This cloak depicts lovely roses and a delicate butterfly; it was named by Matanda on Demian! It gives the wearer a 15% Speed and a 100 HP boost.
description.br: Esta capa descreve lindas rosas e uma delicada borboleta; foi nomeado por Matanda em Demian!
description.cns: 这件披风描绘了可爱的玫瑰和一只精致的蝴蝶；它是由马坦达在迪米村命名的！装备上给予移动速度+15%和HP+100。
description.de: Dieser Umhang zeigt schöne Rosen und einen zarten Schmetterling; er wurde von Matanda auf Demian benannt! Er verleiht dem Träger 15% Geschwindigkeit und eine zusätzliche HP Rate von 100.
description.fi: This cloak depicts lovely roses and a delicate butterfly; it was named by Matanda on Demian! It gives the wearer a 15% Speed and a 100 HP boost.
description.fil: This cloak depicts lovely roses and a delicate butterfly; it was named by Matanda on Demian! It gives the wearer a 15% Speed and a 100 HP boost.
description.fr: Cette cape est décorée de charmantes roses et d'un délicat papillon. Elle a été nommée par Matanda sur Demian ! Elle offre à son porteur 15% de Vitesse de Déplacement et 100 Points de Vie.
description.id: Cloak ini menggambarkan mawar yang indah dan kupu-kupu yang halus; itu dinamai oleh Matanda di Demian! Ini memberi pemakainya 15% Speed dan 100 HP boost.
description.it: This cloak depicts lovely roses and a delicate butterfly; it was named by Matanda on Demian! It gives the wearer a 15% Speed and a 100 HP boost.
description.jp: このマントは素敵なバラと繊細な蝶を描いています。デミアンのマタンダによって名付けられました！
description.kr: 이 망토는 아름다운 장미와 섬세한 나비를 묘사합니다. 그것은 Demian의 Matanda에 의해 명명되었습니다! 착용자에게 15 % 속도와 100 HP 부스트를 제공합니다.
description.nl: This cloak depicts lovely roses and a delicate butterfly; it was named by Matanda on Demian! It gives the wearer a 15% Speed and a 100 HP boost.
description.pl: This cloak depicts lovely roses and a delicate butterfly; it was named by Matanda on Demian! It gives the wearer a 15% Speed and a 100 HP boost.
description.ru: Дизайн этого плаща был разработан простым мадригальцем по имени Matanda. Дает +15% к скорости и +100 к ОЗ.
description.sp: Esta capa representa unas hermosas rosas y una delicada mariposa; ¡fue nombrada por Matanda en Demian! Le da al usuario un 15% de Velocidad de Movimiento y un aumento de 100 HP.
description.sw: This cloak depicts lovely roses and a delicate butterfly; it was named by Matanda on Demian! It gives the wearer a 15% Speed and a 100 HP boost.
description.th: เสื้อคลุมนี้แสดงถึงดอกกุหลาบที่น่ารักและผีเสื้อที่ละเอียดอ่อน มันถูกตั้งชื่อโดย Matanda บน Demian! ทำให้ผู้สวมใส่มีความเร็ว 15% และบูสต์ 100 HP
description.tw: 繪有可愛玫瑰花和蝴蝶的斗篷，移動速度+15%和HP+100
description.vi: Chiếc áo choàng được đặt tên bởi Matanda trên Demian! Nó cung cấp cho người mặc 15% Tốc độ và tăng 100 HP.
